questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: Firstly In 10 years time, I hope that I'll be happy like today. I'll be the boss of my compagny. I hope that i'll be married and that i will explorate the world with my wife, I want to know all about the planet where i live.
I hope that the people who are important for me will be still alive,and that i'll enjoy all the moment that i'll stay with them.
